lender.name: CJ
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me this as a gift...a gift that will keep giving!

lender.name: Adam & Courtney
lender.loan_because: We are so lucky to live where and how we do. We have more than we need. We love Kiva because its not just 'giving' its empowering. Very cool stuff!

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to reach around the world and connect with an individual.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: ... if we all helped each other, what a great place this world would be.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not. ~Dr. Seuss

lender.name: Kathleen

lender.name: Walter

lender.name: Art

lender.occupational_info: Making the world aware that Americans are really compassionate, caring people that want to help those that need a helping hand.

lender.name: Karen

lender.name: Tracie

lender.name: Brendon and Sara
lender.loan_because: would like everyone in the world to have the same opportunities we were blessed enough to have

lender.name: Ka L.
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of something that's bigger than me and do what i can do help ppl in third world countries.

lender.name: GreenBean
lender.loan_because: We have so much, and I want to help others, who want to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work with amazing creative and technology professionals in the production of interactive media for the automotive industry in the United States, Europe and India.

lender.name: Heart Press

lender.occupational_info: Heart Press - Best in Women's Fiction

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: I want to help create a better life for people around the world which they can take ownership of and be proud of.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much. Helping others is my purpose, helping others is my rent for my time on earth.
lender.occupational_info: I write screenplays and I teach kids and adults to read.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have experienced the wonderful way so many people seem to be helped with so little resource.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor of brain diseases

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It is a very worthwhile cause!
lender.occupational_info: Administrative

lender.name: Anneka
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can help and it feels good. I want people to succeed and feel happy. I've been blessed with a lot of support in my life and this is one way I can support others to live with more peace and stability.

lender.name: Aleta
lender.loan_because: We need to help one another in this world.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is good for ALL people.
lender.occupational_info: National Defense

lender.name: Brenna
lender.loan_because: I understand how difficult it is to gather the resources needed to get a business started.
lender.occupational_info: I design clothing and then make samples of the designs as assignments in school, but eventually I hope to work for a major designer creating designs for high-end brands.

lender.name: Ayako
lender.loan_because: It is exciting connecting to someone across the world.It is presure to help people.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I have family ties to Ukraine and emotional ties to Peru. The thought of helping these deserving entrepreneurs in these countries and others via micro financing loans is very exciting.
lender.occupational_info: I find finance, human resources, development, and operations executives for companies and nonprofit organizations.

lender.name: Dusty
lender.loan_because: I started in sales at a very young age and before I could get started I needed a loan to do so. I had no credit and no one to co-sign for me. I finally found an Institution that was willing to take me as a risk. Today I am finacially sound and I owe it all to somemone who had a little bit of faith in me. Everyone deserves a chance to be successful. Hard work and faith will make any business thrive.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I think this is an excellent idea!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes heating and cooling equipment for buildings.

lender.name: John & Catherine
lender.loan_because: because we care.

lender.name: Earle
lender.loan_because: I learned of Kiva through John and Hank Green and Brotherhood 2.0, and it is awesome to know that I can really help other poeple this way.

lender.name: Marian Pritchett School
lender.loan_because: I want my students to understand the importance of giving and of self-sufficiency. They raised the money to make this loan and they chose the entrepreneur. My girls do not have a lot, but they need to know about others who have less and what they can do to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a school for pregnant and parenting girls. I focus a lot on life skills as well as the curriculum.

lender.name: Kaprem
lender.loan_because: ...just because.
lender.occupational_info: U.S. Coast Guard Port State Control

lender.name: Kendall & Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: other people deserve what I am so fortunate to have.

lender.name: Paddi S
lender.loan_because: I work very hard as a small business owner. I admire the spirit in anyone who strives to succeed . I believe in the power of one. I will help change the world one small step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am self employed as a USANA independent distributor and I am studying to receive my accreditation as a life coach.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: In as much as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.
lender.occupational_info: I fool around with words.

lender.name: Tyson
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Chris

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I thought this would be a great way to involve our children in our charitable giving and also as a way of making it more meaninful or personal for all of us

lender.name: Tim and Heide
lender.loan_because: we think that it's fantastic to be self-employed and make things happen. We loan because we are fortunate enough to being able to do so.

lender.name: Jim

lender.name: Anayah
lender.occupation: Founder and Executive Producer Angel Heart RWriter
lender.loan_because: For me it is a joy to experience the gift of giving, and it is after all, what will lead the world into sustainable balance for all. I made the loan to Agne Lisseth Garca Vicente In memory of my dear friend Laureen.
lender.occupational_info: Angel Heart Radio is for Us All, to rejoice, grow, prosper, discover & share our true nature - we are All the Change we are wishing to see! I write to inspire, uplift, and to remind us all that every single person is valuable, divine in nature and a part of the same family.

lender.name: Elliott Family
lender.loan_because: We are excited about the global benefits of microcredit and growth of small businesses. lender.loan_because: it is a great opportunity to help other people in need of a simple boost to pick their business up and get going to make a better life for themselves and those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student studying to get my business degree and hope to one day start my own small business and grow from there.

lender.name: Roger and Barbara
lender.loan_because: We believe everyone in the world is equal and should help one another. We work for Peace.

lender.name: Ada
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving to others and hope to see them succeed in realizing their goals

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur too. I enjoy offering a small bit of help to fellow female artisans and small business owners. I love learning about these amazing people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I own a retail store in Seattle, Washington. My small staff and I make handbags and women's accessories.

lender.loan_because: I was 1st given it as a gift, now becase I want to.
lender.occupational_info: Make reservations for people to travel anywhere, on anything.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to give my fellow human beings a fighting chance to lift themselves out of poverty and despair though hard work and entrepreneurship. As my mom used to say, "The Lord help them who help themselves."
lender.occupational_info: I used to help manage a prison, now I help manage a college.

lender.name: Autumn
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have special needs and give them the extra help they need to succeed in school and society.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: We like to do good, and together my sister and I are an unstoppable force. You kick *ss, DC!

lender.loan_because: I believe the best way to help people is not a hand out but to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Clint
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: it matters
lender.occupational_info:
theparadigmproject's mission is to support and advance positive social, environmental, economic and cultural transformation through market and community based innovation, implementation, empowerment and restorative development.
paradigmdevelopment is an eco development and service company providing sustainable solutions through green building services, consulting, home assessments, green ratings, home energy performance testing and the intelligent production of new and remodeled green homes.
Cenergie (www.cenergie.com) makes zero-emission, high efficiency, mass manufacturable Alkaline Fuel Cells (AFC) that are silent, low temperature, quick-start, flexible, recyclable, reliable and directly price competitive with conventional energy production.
Our mission is to bring fuel cell technology to the mass market, accelerate the development of a Clean Hydrogen Economy, and enable the supply of clean affordable power to all.
When combined with our Total Utility Solution (TUS) Waste-to-Energy system they can provide a lower cost per kWh. Our primary markets are stationary, distributed generation, mobile and marine fleet applications and we are working toward a number of Clean H2 solutions with solar, wind, tidal, electrolysis, landfill methane reformation, waste gasification, algeal and other partner technologies.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Everyone wants to help others. But I think giving as directly as possible to the individuals working to build a livelihood is the most effective way to help.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Giving charity is great. Giving opportunity is better.
lender.occupational_info: I play music for adults and children, and I teach at a University.

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I am starting a motorcycle transportation business that will help my (4) four brothers who are jobless. It is a rent to own after three years. I have started already one motorcycle and it helps a lot for a family.I want to loan for $1,000.00
lender.occupational_info: I am a public teacher by profession.

lender.name: Allen & Sherry
lender.loan_because: We want to give people a chance to do the things they want to do.

lender.name: Isabelle & Grace
lender.loan_because: It 's a good lesson for the girls to help those in need.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I want to use the prosperity that I have been blessed with, to also help others to become prosperous, and in that way give back to life some of which I have been given.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Living and loving life and trying to get into law school

lender.loan_because: I believe in Lao Tzu's saying: Give a man a fish, and he has food for a day; teach a man to fish, he has food for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist and calligrapher. I also teach, and love empowering people!

lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loan as a 'hand up' can be a tool for self independence
lender.occupational_info: I look at how handicrafts made by poor artisans can be used a tool to fight poverty, into sustainability of the artisan, environment and their community

lender.occupational_info: I help maintain and improve quality of patient care and outcomes by assisting physicians with data, studies, and initiatives.

lender.loan_because: I want to help everyone that all may become happy even a little.

lender.name: Duane Judith Kate

lender.loan_because:
Together we can help make dreams come true.

lender.loan_because:
We have a duty as human beings to provide a helping hand to a less fortunate person / family.
Remember, your daily starbuck coffee can go a long way in helping someone keep ahead just a little.
lender.occupational_info: IT Field

lender.name: Bruno
lender.loan_because: I wan to help without patronizing
lender.occupational_info: Helping companies & organizations to communicate efficiently over the Internet

lender.name: Martin Baker
lender.loan_because: From the first time I heard about Kiva, I was blown away by the idea. I love the idea that Kiva is all about empowering people to achieve their dreams and aspirations.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer software and also train people on how to use software.

lender.name: catherine coleman
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am a Greatgrandmother several times over and appreciate what I have!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I have to be my brother's keeper inorder for me fulfill what God expects from me. The reason am opportuned to loan or give is the essence of the Opportunity of being able to do.
lender.occupational_info: As a Services provider, I do services within the confines of the law. Basically, I do outsourcing for would be clients. And on the security consultancy, I do services, solutions and reviews / analysis on general security applications/measures.

lender.loan_because: We love Kiva because it empowers people to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Our main professions are in the area of Health Care. As a family, we enjoy volunteering in our community.

lender.name: Rhonda & Chris
lender.loan_because: It empowers others to rise above circumstances out of their control!
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator of a Surgery Center and work with indigent patients as an FNP.

lender.name: Yutaka H.
lender.loan_because: Believe that this small $25 for me, will make big diferrence and better changes to their life. Specific reason for this loan is that, she is at the same age as me; I've been always feeling that, I was just happened to be born in one of wealtiest countries, and should share this wealth with those who are in developing country, rather than just saving money in bank account.
lender.occupational_info: My job is business development for plant engineering business. My company constructs plant like refinery etc. in countries where resources are (countries in Middle East etc.). Nothing to do with microfinance;

lender.name: Renske
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: I owe it to folks who have helped, are helping me and will help me pursue happiness.
lender.occupational_info: Higher education. I work for a university.

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: This is such a good way to help someone in another part of the world--help themselves.

lender.occupational_info: Determine what types of services customers/businesses require related to their telecommunication needs and provide recommendations.

lender.name: Invisible Hand
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the greatest examples of the success of Capitalism.

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do. In our glutton-ess society, we need to wake up and look beyond ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I educate women about hospital policy, medications & teach women the tools they need to get through childbirth.

lender.name: Girls in the Hood and Jo
lender.loan_because: We work hard to get ahead and want others, especially women, to have the same opportunity. Our town was recently hit by several hurricanes and are fortunate to be able to recover from this.
lender.occupational_info: We work in an upscale womens clothing store and sell clothing, swimwear, shoes and jewelry. We live in a beautiful beach community .

lender.name: shawna
lender.loan_because: I am a disciple of Jesus Christ. He calls on us to help our neighbors in need on His behalf. It is He who is truely showing His love to you through me.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bookstore.

lender.name: Jrgen
lender.loan_because: I am unhappy with the KIVA loans to developed countries. Please join the Unhappy Kiva lenders team: www.kiva.org/community/viewTeam?team_id=7326

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: A little help can go a long way!
lender.occupational_info: I teach Philadelphia high school students reading and writing.

lender.name: Mrs. Charity's Class
lender.loan_because: As an art teacher, I want to promote sharing with artists who are in need of help in different parts of the world. All 700 of my art students will help to decided who to support each year. There is no better way to teach responsibility, one of the character traits our school works to instill.
lender.occupational_info: We are young children learning the basics of art and creating beauty with our work and our lives.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: all of us must feel responsible for making this world a better place. This by helping others to raise capital for economically productive activities.
lender.occupational_info: I wholesale properties(land and houses) in addition to helping people save their properties from lender foreclosures. I provide engineering services including air conditioning, electrical and electronics works, systems and industrial automation.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to make a positive difference in someone else's life, no matter how small.

lender.loan_because: It is useful and fun to track the recipients.

lender.loan_because: As a company and as individuals, we believe in giving back.

lender.name: Karyn
lender.loan_because: I've been to Southern Sudan and I saw firsthand how micro-loans can help.

lender.name: Stacy, Jim, and Nick
lender.loan_because: My family is so blessed, and this is a way to share our blessings with the world.
lender.occupational_info:
As a lawyer, Stacy goes to court to defend the State of Colorado. Stacy will be retiring as a lawyer in June 2008, and will then work full-time as a Realtor helping people buy and sell their homes.
Jim is a teacher at our son's school. He teaches children ages 6 to 14 how to use computers.
Our son, Nick, is a teenager. He plays soccer and trumpet, and is a very good student. He wants to be a scientist and engineer when he's grown.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Trying to help others less fortunate become self-sufficient. We are our brothers keepers.
lender.occupational_info: Although now retired I spent my entire career in Information Techology.

lender.loan_because: I like giving people a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help people deal with heartbreak and life's pain.

lender.name: Guy

lender.name: Anastasia
lender.loan_because: This is something small I can do to help...
lender.occupational_info: I sell advertising space in a popular magazine

lender.name: SMILES Team
lender.loan_because: we want to make a difference!

lender.occupational_info: I own a Catering business, a Cafe and a Event site

lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I've received.

lender.name: Stephan Kleiber
lender.loan_because: it works

lender.name: Kaner-Roths and Anna
lender.loan_because: It is fun!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I have met many wonderful people around the world
lender.occupational_info: I help build new houses and shops

lender.name: Adam & Tara
lender.loan_because: we believe in human creativity and in the power of entrepreneurial drive. We also loan because it is one way that we can heed Jesus' words that challenged us to aid our brothers and sisters who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with my father and brother to build communities where people can then build their own home.

lender.name: Wendi
lender.loan_because: I want to offer people an opportunity for a future. People that are driven to entreprenuership should have access to the tools and resources to get started and keep building their futures.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own several business focussing on marketing, online advertising, and business development.

lender.name: Marianna
lender.loan_because: to empower women

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I think people live better lives when they are independent and in control of their own destiny, and microfinance supports that.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I was helped to get where I am and I continue to be blessed by people who show up!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies implement software solutions that enable business across company and country boundaries

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I find it so satisfying to help facilitate tangible progress in peoples' lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make good financial decisions for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Rob & Justyn
lender.loan_because: We have both traveled around the world and understand what a small amount of money can do in a developing nation. With the true understanding of "it only takes one", we are excited to be part of someone's success who is hard working but may not have been given the opportunities afforded to those of us living in the United States.
lender.occupational_info: Rob is a retired Marine Corps Helicopter pilot and Justyn is a former Air Force Dentist. Today we are both Real Estate Sales associates while operating a Property Management Company.

lender.name: Luke
lender.occupational_info: I advise small businesses on marketing. This includes what customers to attract, products to sell, how to advertise, pricing, promotion and much more.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: My aunt and uncle gave me the first loan and added more credit later

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children while their parents are working.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I have always been poor. I'm still poor. But I still have the ability to help people in third world countries, because my poor is their rich. So if I can help, I will help. Besides, I'm not giving money away, I'm lending.
lender.occupational_info: As a Buddhist practitioner my purpose is to end suffering for all living beings. Everything we do to that end is beneficial. For the helper and the helpee. If we all did this for each other, everyone would become happy.

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. I can't give much money so I want to donate where it will do a great deal of good in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for sells software programs and I teach our clients how to use the software.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one person to help another person.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English professor and a poet.

lender.name: Shelby
lender.loan_because: it is my tithe. 10% of my income is either donated to Kiva or loaned out through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I study Global History, Latin American Studies, and the Spanish language.

lender.name: Susie & Neil
lender.loan_because: We believe micro lending is the best way to make a direct impact on the most number of lives with the amount of money we have to donate.
lender.occupational_info: Susie is a commercial real estate broker in California. She helps people find the buildings they need to operate their businesses. Neil is Director of Business Development for a projector manufacturer.

lender.name: Ginnilu
lender.loan_because: I think that helping other people is a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have tax problems with the U.S. Government

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: Investing in others empowers them to develop as they wish. Aid only empowers the donors and NGOs.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It's a way to pay it forward in a constuctive way and keep it going forward when each loan is repaid.
